ygData.subject: Re: Heritrix 2.0.0 Job start
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Erik besides the change of port numner to 8849 I also had to do this export JAVA_OPTS= -Xmx512M -Djava.rmi.server.hostname=X.X.X.X It seems to work

Thanks Erik

besides the change of port numner to 8849

I also had to do th=
is

export JAVA_OPTS=3D"-Xmx512M -Djava.rmi.server.hostname=3DX.X.X.X"

It =
seems to work now, let me see if I can control heritrix this way

Thanks

-=

-jar cmdline-jmxclient-0.10.5.jar controlRole:admin localhost:8080 org.arch=
ive.crawler:name=3DHeritrix,type=3DService
> 
> Heritrix listens for HTTP c=
onnections (the web user interface) on port
> 8080, not JMX. JMX is listeni=
ng on port 8849. Try the following
> instead:
> 
> java -jar cmdline-jmxcli=
ent-0.10.5.jar controlRole:admin localhost:8849 org.archive.crawler:name=3D=
Heritrix,type=3DService
> 
> best,
